mapper.select:
SELECT equipment_storage.id storage_id, equipment_storage.project_id, equipment_storage.item_id, equipment_storage.item, equipment_storage.params, equipment_storage.model, equipment_storage.number, equipment_storage.supplier_id, equipment_storage.remark, equipment_storage.tag_numer, equipment_storage.meter, equipment_storage.measuring_range, equipment_storage.meter_signal, equipment_storage.connection_mode, equipment_storage.tube, purchase_project.project_name, supplier.`name` supplier_name FROM equipment_storage inner join purchase_project on equipment_storage.project_id = purchase_project.id inner join supplier on equipment_storage.supplier_id = supplier.id where equipment_storage.is_active=1 and purchase_project.is_active=1 and supplier.is_active=1
and equipment_storage.project_id = #{projectId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
and equipment_storage.item like "%"#{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and supplier.`name` like "%"#{supplierName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
